name: Slime Grinder
description:
This is the first game that we've ever created, individually and as a team! I hope everyone enjoys!

Relax, take a couple seconds, and infuriate yourself with an infinite runner! Charge up your jump with Z and release it to jump from building to building. Grind on rails by pressing X before you land on them. Simple enough!

Controls:

  • Z - Charged Jump, Slam Down, Confirm Selection
  • X - Grind, Change Selection

Follow us on Twitter to keep updated on what's to come!

Team:

  • Jojo
  • Nom
  • Doin' Fine
  • Hydrangea.Syndrome

Listen to the soundtrack here!
